mapper.select: SELECT #{vote_id} as vote_id, movie_id, count, total_voter_count, ROUND(count * 100.0 / total_count, 1) AS percentage, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY count DESC) AS rank FROM ( SELECT movie_id, count, SUM(count) OVER() AS total_count, SUM(voter_cnt) OVER() AS total_voter_count FROM ( SELECT movie_id, COUNT(*) AS count, COUNT(DISTINCT mem_no) AS voter_cnt FROM vote_record WHERE vote_id = #{vote_id} GROUP BY movie_id ) )
mapper.update: update vote_record set record_created_date=sysdate, vote_comment_text=#{vote_comment_text} where mem_no=#{mem_no}
